response: As an AI, I don't have personal preferences or emotions. However, I can provide information about popular artists across various genres. Some notable artists include Leonardo da Vinci, Vincent van Gogh, Pablo Picasso, Frida Kahlo, Salvador Dalí, Claude Monet, Andy Warhol, Jackson Pollock, Michelangelo, and many more. It ultimately depends on your personal taste and the type of art you enjoy.
